phrases: We have a new teacher joining us today.
But she does not seem to be here yet, so I will introduce her later.
She must be awfully impressive to arrive late on her first day.
Well, that is enough joking around.
Earlier, you said you are researching demi-humans, did not you?
I was thinking of making them the topic of my college thesis.
But dealing with demi-humans is always delicate,
so a simple teacher cannot get permission.
To this day, I have still never even seen a demi-human.
Well, the number of demi-humans is really quite low...
Why choose them as your topic?
Why do you bring this up?
I am sorry I am late!
Come up to the front and introduce yourself.
My train was delayed due to a car inspection, and...
The train I tried to take was very crowded!
I can understand her being late,
but is a crowded train an excuse?
Well, I suppose she cannot help it.
Oh, what I mean is that she is...
there are people called demi-humans who possess special qualities.
The demi-humans who have been used as motifs in myths and fairy tales.
They have also endured persecution in the past.
But discrimination has been less common in recent years,
and there is even a welfare system for demi-humans
who live with any sort of disadvantage.
Now, being a demi-human is seen as just another aspect of one's identity.
Did you go anywhere for spring break?
You are going to keep talking?

Shizaki High School Opening Ceremony: Order of Service Opening Address, National Anthem, Approval of New Students, Principal's Address, New Students' Pledge, Current Students' Congratulatory Address, Reading of Congratulatory Messages, School Song, Closing Address
I am Takahashi, the biology teacher.
It is nice to meet you.
Um, as I said this morning, I am a succubus.
That is why I dress and act to avoid evoking sexual thoughts,
and refrain from contact with others as much as possible!
I noticed the way you have, um...
been watching me from afar all this time.
It is troublesome if you approach me purely out of curiosity.
Wait, Satou-sensei, you have got it all wrong.
No, I should apologize for my indiscretion.
I am fine, so please do not worry about me.
She will never talk to me now.
What are you doing at this hour?
So you are a new student?
And you are a teacher here, huh?
What were you doing there before the entrance ceremony, anyway?
I was trying on my uniform at home, and I got kind of excited.
I am going to go to school right now!
But did you have to run off at top speed like that?
Anyone would run if some weird old guy they do not know speaks to them.
They taught us that in school.
I think you should praise my calm decision to flee immediately,
as well as my swift response to the situation!
We do not need to talk about me!
My classmate is not feeling well!
Help me carry her to the nurse's office!
Okay, I will be right there... Um...
Okay, thanks for coming to let me know, Takanashi.
But I hope there is actually some way I can help.
But I am not a teacher for nothing, you know.
I can judge a student's health with one look at her face.
So she is basically one of those, right?
A demi-human whose head is separate from its body?
I went ahead and carried her head to the nurse's office,
but her body's too heavy for me.
Is it safe to touch this flame?
It does not look hot, but...
I will be okay once I cool down.
I am a snow woman, so I am okay.
I am a snow woman, so it is totally okay...
Wow, we have got a snow woman, too?
Let us get to the nurse's office, too.
I am glad you were the first person I found.
I mean, she is pretty big.
You seem pretty calm about this.
Are not demi-humans unusual to you?
Well, yeah, I would say they are unusual,
but they do not surprise me.
The snow woman has mild heat exhaustion from P.E. class,
and the dullahan just has a cold.
Just thinking meeting demi-humans is easier than I realized.
I am sort of shocked, I guess...
Sorry, I should not have put it that way.
I have done all kinds of things to try and meet them, but nothing worked.
I was just thinking about other stuff besides how happy I am.
In any case, you are saying you are happy you met me, right?
Sensei, you call people like us demi-humans, do not you?
I used the term to go along with you, but it is outdated!
Demi-human does not sound cute at all, does it?
It sounds like it is out of a textbook.
So high school girls like us
This is why I asked this morning if you would forgotten anything!
How could you forget it, like it is the obvious thing to do?
But I know you will lend me yours, even though you are mad, which is why...
You are always pushing your luck, Onee-chan!
This is my little sister, Himari.
I am Takanashi Himari, from class C.
If you doodle in it again, you will regret it!
She seems more responsible than someone else here.
She is the little sis I am proud of!
Only if it is okay with you, I mean...
You want me to tell you about vampires?
Of course, I will not force you.
Yeah, that is what I thought You will?!
Then, if I talk to you,
can I come and hang out in the biology prep room?
So, Machi-san, you went to the middle school right next to mine?
I never expected to meet someone in this school from so nearby.
Then, do you also take the bus, Machi-san?
Is not that a long walk?
The bus is crowded during school commuter hours, so it is dangerous.
You know, with the way I am built and all.
By the way, I found a really funny video yesterday!
Oh, Machi-san, you watch videos online, too?
Demis are more likely to occur as a result of mutation than genetics.
It is entirely possible for only one twin to be a demi.
I still do not know anything about how demis live,
how they interact with others, how they think, or anything like that.
how they interact with others, how they think, or anything like that.
If there is one thing I now know, it is that...
This room is so nice and dark and cool!
I did say you could come by anytime, but...
Well, the sunlight is so bright in my classroom.
And I would feel bad, making my classmates go out of their way for me...
Yeah, there are lots of things in here that should not be in direct sunlight.
Anyway, Sensei, you want to interview a demi, right?
What do you think of the qualities ascribed to vampires by legend?
Crosses are only fashionable through middle school!
A stake through the heart would kill us!
Do vampires really have to drink blood to stay alive?
No, I do not think that is true.
Do you ever get anemic, Sensei?
It is like we often feel that way.
For that reason, we prefer to stay out of the sun, too.
So if we are careful about what we eat, we can get by okay.
It feels just like drinking blood!
Meaning that you really do desire blood?
Vampires are provided with blood by the government.
We get one pack per month.
Maybe drinking that makes it so I can get by on the food I eat.
Then, there are some vampires who get by without relying on that blood...
What do you think of those vampires?
I think they are pretty amazing!
All right, that is enough for today.
Give me one more chance, please!
I will never ask another favor!
What do you think of that?
I think they are pretty amazing...
Wow, I really get it now.
By the way, do you ever want to take blood directly?
Stories say people you drink from become vampires
or that you can make them your servants.
Is not that what your fangs are for?
Ever want to use them to suck blood?
Oh, you know that snow woman in the class next door?
Yeah, the one from the other day.
Since she is a snow woman, her body feels so cold!
so I cling to her a lot.
And then, when I get a look at the nape of her neck...
But this feels hot to me...
I think, Ah, her body is cold, but I bet her blood is warm,
and I bet that contrast would feel great if I sucked her blood,
and I would love to see how she struggles and the pain showing on her face.
I do not do it, though, since she would hate me.
Guess you were not aware of it.
Do you ever want to suck the blood of the opposite sex?
Well, it is not that, exactly.
I think it is probably because I have never been in love...
In a way, sucking blood is an expression of sexual desire.
So fantasizing about sucking girls' blood could pass for a joke,
but you still have some reservations about doing it with boys, huh?
You are too quick on the uptake!
Well, not that I would know, but it seems like sadistic behavior, right?
And my type is someone who is dependable.
So maybe it would be really hard for me to do that.
You were thinking it is nice to be young,
or I am making the most of my youth, or some other old man's thought!
You are quick on the uptake.
This vampire-chan is at that age.
It was insensitive of me to ask all that...
I am the one who said you could ask anything.
I have learned a lot from you.
Do not sink your teeth into me, even by mistake.
You have it pretty rough, huh?
I mean, you have to carry your head everywhere you go, do not you?
Going to and from school must be even worse...
Carrying your bag would take one hand, so that would be dangerous.
I mean, I am a vampire, you know?
So I totally get what you are going through!
Yeah, in my case, I cannot stand strong sunlight...
In summer, I cannot even wear short sleeves!
But vampires cannot stand to be hot, either.
I just want to cover my body in cold compresses!
What are you two talking about?
I never see you during breaks.
You are Machi Kyouko, from 1-B, right?
Er, I guess asking your body's pointless...
Thank you for carrying me to the nurse's office when I had a cold.
and I would be happy to talk to you about being a demi, too.
I also want to thank you personally for your help.
May I come and talk to you sometime?
I also want to thank you personally for your help.
May I come and talk to you sometime?
But you cannot hear his answer with only your body.
I wrote my answer for you.
Carry it back, and do not drop it.
Machi, Feel free to come by anytime.
Let us stop somewhere on the way home.
Next Time Dullahan-chan Wants to Be Coddled
